I am writing to express my interest in applying for a position as a bud tender. I feel I would be a great fit for this position, because I have sales experience and I am passionate about the industry. I am also very eager to learn about new products and advancements within industry.

I recently graduated from the University of Kansas with a degree in communications. I have since worked as the assistant manager for an aftermarket department of a car dealership. My responsibilities included making sales pitches, scheduling appointments, coordinating business to business outsourcing, and fulfilling warranty work. While I do not have any formal experience in the cannabis industry, I have been cultivating a personal garden for over 5 years.

I look forward to hearing back from you and discussing the possibilities of an interview. If you have any questions at all, you can reach me at (785) 643-0706. You can also reach me by email at alex.gshon@gmail.com. Thank you for your time and consideration.


Sincerely,

Alex Gershon
